name: bokor
description: Bokor is a simple, Record and Playback Mock Server written in Node.js, utilized for Service Virtualization.

scripts.test: ./node_modules/.bin/jshint --config .jshintrc index.js lib test examples  && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul test ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -R spec

author: Jimmy Eisenhauer <james.eisenhauer@nike.com> (https://github.com/jimmyeisenhauer)
